name: Enchanter
description: The Enchanter is a Medium humanoid with very high Intelligence and Charisma, focused on manipulating and controlling opponents through powerful enchantments and spells. It wields a dagger and can cast spells to charm or incapacitate its enemies.
memorable: The Enchanter’s Captivating Gaze ability can incapacitate foes, forcing them to spend their turns staring at it.
goals: To manipulate its enemies and control the battlefield through enchantments.
relations: Similar spellcasters and fey creatures, often found in the company of other enchantment-focused beings.
environment: Commonly found in urban settings or areas of magical influence.
strengths: Exceptional spellcaster with high Intelligence and Charisma, excels in crowd control and enchantment spells.
weaknesses: Limited physical defenses with a lower Armor Class, relying heavily on spells for effectiveness in combat.
attacks: Uses a dagger for melee attacks, but primarily focuses on spell attacks to inflict control and damage.
most_powerful_ability: Reach of the Fey allows the Enchanter to target multiple creatures within 10 feet when casting enchantment spells.
equipment: A dagger, used for close combat.
skills: Proficient in arcana and history, making it knowledgeable about magical phenomena.
additional_information: Advantage on saving throws against being charmed due to Fey Ancestry.
A broad spell selection including powerful area control spells.
The ability to incapacitate foes effectively.
Uses Beguiling Parry to disrupt enemy attacks.
spellcasting: A 13th-level spellcaster with a variety of enchantment spells, including charm, hypnotic pattern, and lightning bolt.
test_queries: humanoid with reach of the fey ability
